doc.field: christine, that i see with that philosophy. where do most jobs come from in this country? they come from businesses and they come from mostly actually small businesses, employers who hire less than 50 workers and those are the businesses that are kind of on strike right now. they're hunkered down. they're very worried about the future and you know what? they're worried about washington. they're worried about the health care bill with the new taxes, the union agenda, the climate
